statements: UPDATE media_regulator_complaints SET status = 'Resolved' WHERE complaint_id = 1;
UPDATE media_regulator_complaints SET complaint_date = '2021-09-30 15:30:00' WHERE media_type = 'News' AND status = 'Pending';
UPDATE media_regulator_complaints SET status = 'Resolved', complaint_date = '2022-01-15' WHERE complaint_id = 1
UPDATE media_regulator_complaints SET media_type = 'News', status = 'In Progress' WHERE media_title = 'Breaking News Update'
UPDATE Media_Complaints SET complainant_name='John Doe', complaint_date='2022-08-15' WHERE complaint_id=1;
UPDATE Media_Regulators SET regulator_email='regulator@example.com', regulator_name='MediaWatch', regulator_address='123 Media Ave' WHERE regulator_id=3;
UPDATE Media_Complaints SET complaint_description = 'Resolved', complainant_name = 'John Doe' WHERE complaint_id = 1;
UPDATE Media_Regulators SET regulator_phone = '+1-123-456-7890', regulator_name = 'Media Watchdog' WHERE regulator_id = 2;
UPDATE Media_Complaints SET complaint_text = 'Resolved complaint about the news article.', complaint_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE complaint_id = 12345;
UPDATE Media_Users SET user_email = 'new_email@example.com' WHERE user_id = 56789;
UPDATE Media_Complaints SET complaint_text = 'Updated complaint text', complaint_date = '2022-09-20' WHERE complaint_id = 1234;
UPDATE Media_Users SET user_email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE user_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE Complaints SET media_type='Social Media' WHERE complaint_id=123;
UPDATE Media SET media_name='TV News', media_regulator='FCC' WHERE media_id=456;
UPDATE Complaints SET media_type = 'Newspaper', complaint_text = 'Poor service quality', complaint_date = '2021-10-15' WHERE complaint_id = 101;
UPDATE Media SET media_name = 'ABC News', media_regulator = 'FCC' WHERE media_id = 201;
UPDATE Media_Regulator_Complaints SET complaint_category = 'Hate Speech' WHERE complaint_id = 1;
UPDATE Media_Content SET media_type = 'Movie', content_rating = 'PG-13' WHERE content_id = 3;
UPDATE Media_Regulator_Complaints SET complaint_category = 'Violence' WHERE complaint_id = 12345;
UPDATE Media_Content SET content_rating = 'PG-13', release_date = '2022-10-15' WHERE content_id = 67890;
